articles.title: Notre Dame vs. Indiana score, takeaways: Irish prove too much for overmatched Hoosiers, notch first CFP win - CBS Sports
articles.description: A Sugar Bowl showdown against Georgia awaits Notre Dame after an impressive first-round win
articles.content: (7) Notre Dame secured its first College Football Playoff win in program history Saturday evening, downing (10) Indiana 27-17 inside Notre Dame Stadium. It was a dominant performance from the Fightin… [+2581 chars]

articles.title: Delphi murders: Richard Allen sentenced to 130 years for Indiana deaths - BBC.com
articles.description: Richard Allen was convicted last month for the "Delphi murders" of Liberty German, who was 14, and Abigail Williams, 13, in 2017.
articles.content:
Richard Allen, a US man convicted last month of killing two teenagers in the state of Indiana, has been sentenced to 130 years behind bars for their deaths. 
The bodies of teenagers Liberty German, … [+2286 chars]
